source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000010_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>My usual, please. But with this spice.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000010_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>今日も世話になる。
このスパイスで「いつもの」を頼めるか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000020_MEHRYDE<tab>Of course, Zero. It would be my pleasure.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000020_MEHRYDE<tab>ご贔屓にしていただいて、ありがとうございます。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000030_MEHRYDE<tab>Well now, this is enough to make a whole kettle of your special curry!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000030_MEHRYDE<tab>これだけあれば、ゼロ様御用達の「特製カレー」が、
大鍋いっぱいに作れますわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000040_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I don't need that much...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000040_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>さすがにそれは多すぎるな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000050_MEHRYDE<tab>Rest assured, it's easy enough to make a serving just for you. Or we could make the kettle and share it?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000050_MEHRYDE<tab>でしたら、ゼロ様からのご厚意という形で、
ほかのお客様にも「特製カレー」を振る舞うのはどうでしょう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000060_MEHRYDE<tab>There would be enough not only for your companions, but other diners as well. I daresay everyone will be delighted.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000060_MEHRYDE<tab>せっかく太守様と冒険者様もお連れいただいたのですから、是非！
皆、きっと喜びますよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000070_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Very well. A full kettle, then.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000070_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>わかった、そうしてくれ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000080_MEHRYDE<tab>Excellent. We'll prepare it at once.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000080_MEHRYDE<tab>承知しました、すぐにご用意いたしますね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000090_MEHRYDE<tab>And for Your Excellency and our esteemed adventurer? Are you happy to try a bowl of Zero's curry? We can make yours milder, if you prefer...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000090_MEHRYDE<tab>おふたりとも、ゼロ様と同じカレーでよろしいですか？
辛さを控えめにすることもできますが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000100_VARSHAHN<tab>Grateful though I am for the offer, I cannot fully appreciate the flavor with this vessel. Another time, perhaps.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000100_VARSHAHN<tab>せっかくの申し出だが、
この身体では十分に味わうことが難しいのだ。
私はまた別の機会にいただくとしよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000110_VARSHAHN<tab>Do not hold back on my account, my friend. Eat and enjoy.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000110_VARSHAHN<tab>君は遠慮せず、好きなものを頼むといい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Then I'll have His Excellency's helping!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>ゼロと同じ「特製カレー」で！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>If I could have mine a touch milder...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>辛さ控えめで……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000120_MEHRYDE<tab>Understood. Please, make yourselves comfortable.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000120_MEHRYDE<tab>かしこまりました。
では、お席にてお待ちください。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000130_VARSHAHN<tab>It gladdens me to see you taking to life in Radz-at-Han, Zero. In the area of our cuisine not least of all.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000130_VARSHAHN<tab>ゼロ、君が我が国に馴染んでくれてよかった。
ラザハン自慢のスパイス料理が口に合ったようだな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000140_VARSHAHN<tab>Spicy dishes have long been favored in our sultry clime for their ability to whet the appetite and cool the body.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000140_VARSHAHN<tab>この高温多湿な風土では、食欲を増進し、
汗をかいて体温を下げるためにも辛味が好まれる。
ゆえに、多種多様な香辛料の栽培や活用が進んでいるのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000150_VARSHAHN<tab>Of course, spices also have the effect of preserving foods, which makes them highly coveted in foreign lands.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000150_VARSHAHN<tab>食物が傷むのを防ぐ効果もあって、他国での需要も高い。
ラザハンはそうした特産品を、どこに対しても、
商いの上では平等に取引してきた……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000160_VARSHAHN<tab>All of this has given rise to a thriving spice industry, and the wealth it brings has allowed our nation to prosper while maintaining its neutrality.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000160_VARSHAHN<tab>それがかえって多くの富をもたらし、
中立国という立場を揺るがぬものにしたというわけだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000170_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>So you trade your spices. Seems rather more complicated than trading in aether.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000170_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>もっぱらエーテルだけを取引している私たちと違って、
あれやこれやと大変そうだな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000180_VARSHAHN<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000180_VARSHAHN<tab>ふふ……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000190_VARSHAHN<tab>In the beginning, this land was no more than refuge for me.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000190_VARSHAHN<tab>かつて、私にとってこの地は、
海底で見つけた次元の裂け目を監視するための、
羽休めの場にすぎなかった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000200_VARSHAHN<tab>But now it is my home, and the people of Radz-at-Han my beloved children.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000200_VARSHAHN<tab>しかし今では、ラザハンに生きる子ら皆が愛しい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000210_VARSHAHN<tab>Together we built this vibrant nation. And naught would please me more than to show it to my sister one day.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000210_VARSHAHN<tab>賑やかで、鮮やかで、
終末の影響をも乗り越えようとしている……
この美しい都と人の営みを、姉さんにも見せてやりたいのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000220_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Vibrant... Rubicante said the same when he described this world.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000220_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>美しい、か……。
ルビカンテも同じことを言っていたな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000230_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>A reminder of all that has been stolen from us... What many who remember doubtless yearn to take back.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000230_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>たしかにこの世界は、
私たちが失って久しい、目映さがある。
もう一度手に入れたいと思うほどの……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000240_FIREMONOLITH<tab>Our home is a lost cause, our only choice to begin anew.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000240_FIREMONOLITH<tab>いかにも……。
終わった世界を今さらどうこうすることはできない。
だが、異なる世界を手にすれば状況は変わる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000250_FIREMONOLITH<tab>In this world, where we may reclaim our mortality.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000250_FIREMONOLITH<tab>我らは再び、尊厳ある生命に戻るのだ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000260_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Nonetheless, it's wrong to damn another to save yourself─as I told Rubicante. As I found myself moved to speak...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000260_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>だが、私は奴に、誰かから奪うのでは意味がないと……
他人とは、強さでも契約でもないもので繋がっていたいと……
思わず口走っていた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000270_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I still do not understand what made me feel this way. Nor what compels you mortals to help one another. But I hope to someday.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000270_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>その意味は、自分でもまだはっきりと解っていない。
私は……私が求める繋がりの正体を知りたいんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000280_VARSHAHN<tab>We, too, hope that you will find the answers you seek.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000280_VARSHAHN<tab>君が答えに辿りつけるよう、願っている。
それまで引き続き、力を貸してくれ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000290_HANNISHMAN04735A<tab>What is going on?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000290_HANNISHMAN04735A<tab>お、おい、あれ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000300_HANNISHMAN04735B<tab>What? What's happening?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000300_HANNISHMAN04735B<tab>何事だ……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000310_MEHRYDE<tab>Compliments of Mistress Zero, the satrap's honored guest, we are serving a special curry for anyone who wishes to partake. But be warned: it is not for the faint of heart!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000310_MEHRYDE<tab>本日は太守様の御客人、ゼロ様のご厚意により、
ご希望の方に「特製カレー」を振る舞わせていただきます。
刺激的なお味ですので、気をつけてお召し上がりください！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000320_HANNISHMAN04735B<tab>Oh! By all means, I'd welcome the challenge!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000320_HANNISHMAN04735B<tab>おうい！
そのカレー、挑戦させてくれ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000330_HANNISHMAN04735A<tab>Sisters have mercy...the smell alone is...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000330_HANNISHMAN04735A<tab>うっ……匂いがもう……辛い……ッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000340_HANNISHMAN04735B<tab>It burns! It burns!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000340_HANNISHMAN04735B<tab>ぐああ！
か、かれぇーーーーー！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000350_VARSHAHN<tab>To better maintain the facade, the alchemists ensured that my vessel was capable of consuming food...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000350_VARSHAHN<tab>この身体は、人らしく見えるよう、
大抵の食物を処理できるようになっているが……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000360_VARSHAHN<tab>However, I fear Zero's curry would test the limits of their design.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000360_VARSHAHN<tab>あれはさすがに、どうだろうな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000370_MEHRYDE<tab>Apologies for the delay. Please relax and enjoy your meal.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000370_MEHRYDE<tab>おまちどおさま。
どうぞ、ごゆっくり……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000380_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>“Relax”? I don't have time for that. I've been waiting for this...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000380_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>ゆっくりなど、していられるか。
私は待っていたんだ……これを……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000390_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Come, let's replenish our aether.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000390_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>さあ、補給するぞ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>My whole life flashed before my eyes─and it was exhilarating!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>辛かった……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I thought the spices we picked were perfect.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>うまかった……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000400_VARSHAHN<tab>I trust you have eaten your fill.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000400_VARSHAHN<tab>君たちが満足できたようでなによりだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000410_VARSHAHN<tab>I shall have Mehryde prepare a meal for us to take to Estinien. I suspect he too is overdue a “replenishment.”
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000410_VARSHAHN<tab>せっかくだし、メリードに料理を包んでもらって、
エスティニアンにも届けるとしよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000420_VARSHAHN<tab>By this hour, he will have retired to his chambers at Meghaduta. Come, let us pay him a visit.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000420_VARSHAHN<tab>この時間なら、メーガドゥータ宮の客間に戻っているはずだ。
ふたりも、よければともに来ないか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000430_VARSHAHN<tab>Estinien, are you there? We've brought something for you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000430_VARSHAHN<tab>エスティニアン、いるか？
差し入れを持ってきたのだが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000440_ESTINIEN<tab>Aye... Enter...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000440_ESTINIEN<tab>(-エスティニアンの声-)ああ……いるぞ……入れ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000450_ESTINIEN<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000450_ESTINIEN<tab>フン

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000460_ESTINIEN<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000460_ESTINIEN<tab>フン

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000470_ESTINIEN<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000470_ESTINIEN<tab>フン

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000480_ESTINIEN<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000480_ESTINIEN<tab>ふー

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000490_VARSHAHN<tab>Squid masala from the meyhane. I thought you might enjoy it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000490_VARSHAHN<tab>メリードズメイハネ自慢の、イカのマサラだ。
……食べられるか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000500_ESTINIEN<tab>Masala, eh? I prefer my squid dried, but I'm sure it won't disappoint. My thanks.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000500_ESTINIEN<tab>ほう。
イカは干物の方が好きだが、
まぁ、ありがたく食わせてもらおう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000510_ESTINIEN<tab>Idle as I am in our sorceress's absence, I see. I can't offer much in the way of entertainment, but make yourselves comfortable.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000510_ESTINIEN<tab>お前たちも、魔女殿が戻るまでは手持ち無沙汰か。
もてなしなんぞはできんが、好きにくつろいでいけ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000520_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Shall we disrobe as well?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000520_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>……この部屋では脱いだ方が？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000530_VARSHAHN<tab>No, no. We simply caught our friend unprepared. He will make himself presentable at once, I am sure.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000530_VARSHAHN<tab>いや、彼も服を着るだろう……今すぐに。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000540_YSHTOLA<tab>At last. We've been looking for you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000540_YSHTOLA<tab>みんなここにいたのね、探したわよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000550_VARSHAHN<tab>My friends! Tell me─were you able to devise a way to return to the Thirteenth?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000550_VARSHAHN<tab>戻ってきてくれたか！
では、再び第十三世界に向かう方法が……！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000560_YSHTOLA<tab>I believe so. It required a visit to the moon, where I took the opportunity to enlist Urianger's assistance.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000560_YSHTOLA<tab>ええ、そのために少しばかり月に行ってきたわ。
ウリエンジェにも協力を依頼して、ね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000570_URIANGER<tab>Y'shtola hath told me all. I should be glad to help you free Azdaja and put an end to Golbez's dark plot.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000570_URIANGER<tab>ヴォイドへ渡った月竜アジュダヤを救うため……
そして、原初世界を奪わんとするゴルベーザを止めるためと……
委細、伺っております。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000580_YSHTOLA<tab>If Rubicante spoke true, both Golbez and Azdaja are on the moon of the Thirteenth.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000580_YSHTOLA<tab>ルビカンテによれば、アジュダヤもゴルベーザも、
ヴォイドの月にいるということだったでしょう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000590_YSHTOLA<tab>Unlike here in the Source, however, we have no means of making the journey from the surface of the star itself. The technology simply does not exist.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000590_YSHTOLA<tab>とはいえ、月へと向かう技術は、
こちらの世界でも哲学者議会が長年苦心して確立したもの。
ヴォイドに渡ってから、月を目指すというのは現実的ではないわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000600_YSHTOLA<tab>Therefore, I propose that we employ a gate to deliver us directly to our destination.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000600_YSHTOLA<tab>だから私たちは、闇雲に世界を渡るのではなく、
あちらの月に繋がるゲートを開かなければならない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000610_VARSHAHN<tab>Is such a feat possible?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000610_VARSHAHN<tab>そんなことが可能なのか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000620_YSHTOLA<tab>In theory. Having once been a single whole, the Source and its reflections share striking similarities in geography.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000620_YSHTOLA<tab>ええ……。
原初世界と鏡像世界は、もともとひとつの存在だった。
歩んできた歴史は違えど、土地そのものは酷似しているわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000630_YSHTOLA<tab>And according to a certain someone who unceremoniously whisked us away to the First, the same locations across the worlds are intrinsically bound.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000630_YSHTOLA<tab>そして、私たちを第一世界に召喚した「誰かさん」によれば、
ふたつの世界の位置座標はリンクしている……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000640_YSHTOLA<tab>All of which is to say, were we to pass through a gate on the Source's moon, it should lead us to the moon of the Thirteenth.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000640_YSHTOLA<tab>早い話が、こちらの月にゲートを開ければ、
第十三世界の月に降り立てるだろうということなのよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000650_YSHTOLA<tab>Of course, there is the risk of voidsent gaining entry to our world. Thus did I decide to seek Urianger's counsel.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000650_YSHTOLA<tab>無論、ゲートを開ければ、妖異が攻め入ってくる可能性もある。
それでまずウリエンジェに相談を持ち掛けたというわけ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000660_URIANGER<tab>Both the watcher and the Loporrits are aware of our proposed endeavor. While they are yet deliberating precautionary measures, they have pledged their full cooperation.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000660_URIANGER<tab>月の監視者やレポリットたちに、話は通してあります。
具体的な妖異対策は今後詰めていく必要がありますが、
協力は惜しまないとのこと……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000670_ESTINIEN<tab>You've been busy. I presume you've also found a way to open this gate?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000670_ESTINIEN<tab>そこまで根回しが済んでいるんだ。
ゲートを開ける方法も、わからず仕舞いとは言うまいな？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000680_YSHTOLA<tab>Be it in Radz-at-Han or Sharlayan, scholars have long cast their gaze unto the endless dark of the void.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000680_YSHTOLA<tab>ラザハンやシャーレアン……
世界各地で、長年にわたりヴォイドは研究されてきた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000690_YSHTOLA<tab>And so, with Hannish insights to augment our knowledge, we have indeed conceived of a promising plan to pierce the veil.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000690_YSHTOLA<tab>それらの成果と、私たちが積み重ねてきた知識、経験。
加えて人造アトモスを作り上げたことで、
ひとつの理論を導き出せたの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000700_YSHTOLA<tab>A plan I am confident will succeed precisely because the moon is our stage.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000700_YSHTOLA<tab>恐らく、いけるわ。
ほかならぬ月にならば、私たちは、
ヴォイドゲートを開くことができる……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000710_YSHTOLA<tab>The preparations will be extensive, and we will require vast quantities of aether.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000710_YSHTOLA<tab>ただし、かなり大掛かりな準備が必要よ。
強力な妖異を召喚するときと同様に、
莫大な量のエーテルが必要になる……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000720_YSHTOLA<tab>After all, our gate must be large enough to accommodate another great wyrm.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000720_YSHTOLA<tab>アジュダヤを連れ帰れるほどのゲートとなれば、なおさらね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000730_YSHTOLA<tab>My proposal entails delivering copious amounts of aether to the Tower of Babil in Garlemald.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000730_YSHTOLA<tab>私の考えた策はこうよ。
何かしらの手段で集めたエーテルを、ガレマルドに運ぶ……
あそこには「バブイルの塔」があるわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000740_YSHTOLA<tab>As you will recall, Fandaniel used the structure to destroy the brands imprisoning Zodiark.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000740_YSHTOLA<tab>以前、ファダニエルがゾディアークの封印を破るために、
塔から攻撃を放ったことを覚えていて？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000750_YSHTOLA<tab>And we, in like manner, will use it to channel aether to the moon─and thereby open our gate.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000750_YSHTOLA<tab>あの機能を利用すれば、
集めたエーテルを一気に月へと流し込めるはず。
それを使って術を発動させ、ゲートを開くの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000760_VARSHAHN<tab>I see... Then we shall need someone on the moon for the necessary rituals.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000760_VARSHAHN<tab>とすると、地上でその手はずを整える者と、
月側の準備を進める者が必要になるか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000770_YSHTOLA<tab>Just so, Your Excellency. I intend to head back anon for that very purpose, as well as to help devise our strategy to deal with invading voidsent.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000770_YSHTOLA<tab>ご明察。
私はもう一度月に向かって、術の準備をしつつ、
ゲートが開いたあとの妖異対策を講じるわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000780_YSHTOLA<tab>Along with our lunar allies, we will once again require the assistance of your alchemists, Nidhana not least of all.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000780_YSHTOLA<tab>月の監視者やレポリットの力を借りるのはもちろん、
今回の件を知る錬金術師たちにも、声をかけてみるつもりよ。
ニッダーナを筆頭にね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000790_YSHTOLA<tab>May I trouble you to serve as their escort?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000790_YSHTOLA<tab>彼女たちの護衛役として、あなたに同行を頼めるかしら？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000800_ESTINIEN<tab>Fine by me. The room was beginning to feel constraining.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000800_ESTINIEN<tab>いいだろう。
部屋での鍛錬にも、飽きてきたところだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000810_URIANGER<tab>For my part, I shall oversee the requisite tasks on the star. Might I prevail upon you for your assistance?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000810_URIANGER<tab>地上での準備は、僭越ながら私が主導させていただきましょう。
ひとりでの完遂は困難ゆえ、皆さんのお力をお貸しください。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000820_YSHTOLA<tab>If all are in agreement, then let us set to work.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000820_YSHTOLA<tab>では、行くとしましょうか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000830_YSHTOLA<tab>We'll open our gate. And we will stop Golbez.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000830_YSHTOLA<tab>ゴルベーザの野望を止めるためにも、
必ずヴォイドゲートを開くわよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000840_KRILE<tab>Well, now, if it isn't two of my dearest friends. As for the other two... I don't believe we've had the pleasure.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000840_KRILE<tab>あら、よく見知ったふたりと……
あとのふたりは、はじめましてかしら？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000850_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Not in this vessel, perhaps. 'Tis I, Varshahn...though you are welcome to call me Vrtra, if you prefer.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000850_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>この身体では、そうなるな。
少しばかり背は伸びたが、変わらずヴァルシャンとでも、
ヴリトラとでも呼んでくれ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000860_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Pay me no mind. I merely accompany them.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000860_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>私のことは気にするな。
ただの同行者だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000870_URIANGER<tab>I pray you forgive us our intrusion. If you are occupied, we shall call again anon.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000870_URIANGER<tab>来客中に失礼を……。
出直した方がよろしいでしょうか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000880_KRILE<tab>It's quite all right. We've just finished swapping all our secrets anyway.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000880_KRILE<tab>大丈夫よ、内緒の話というわけでもないし！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000890_KRILE<tab>Erenville occasionally comes and shares the latest gleaner gossip, you see.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000890_KRILE<tab>エレンヴィルさんには、グリーナーとして、
ときどき情報提供をしてもらっているの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000900_KRILE<tab>From forgotten ruins to mysterious relics, if there's aught that might be of interest to the Students, he kindly lets us know.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000900_KRILE<tab>彼らの仲間内に、うちの委員会が究明すべきもの……
未解明の遺物や魔法についての噂が流れていないか、ってね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000910_ERENVILLE<tab>Alas, I must soon depart on an expedition.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000910_ERENVILLE<tab>……が、俺が遠出しなくちゃならないハメになってな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000920_ERENVILLE<tab>As I may be away for an extended period, I wished to give Krile fair warning. Hence my visit today.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000920_ERENVILLE<tab>成り行き次第では、しばらくこっちを空けることになる。
音信不通だなんだと騒がれちゃ困るから、
念のため、報告にあがったわけだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000930_URIANGER<tab>I see. There are specimens that want for procuring, I presume?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000930_URIANGER<tab>おや……。
僻地での収集依頼でも入りましたか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000940_ERENVILLE<tab>No, no, it isn't guildship business, but rather...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000940_ERENVILLE<tab>いいや、ギルドシップ絡みの仕事じゃない……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000950_ERENVILLE<tab>A homecoming.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000950_ERENVILLE<tab>どちらかといえば、里帰りみたいなもんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000960_ERENVILLE<tab>But enough about me. You have business too, yes? And I am in the way.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000960_ERENVILLE<tab>それで、おたくらは？
こっちこそ邪魔ならさっさと退散するが。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000970_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Far from it. As a matter of fact, we should be grateful if you could stay and share your knowledge of the nearby isles with us.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000970_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>いや、君はこのあたりの島々にも詳しいのだろう？
先を急いでいるわけではないのなら、ともに話を聞いてほしい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000980_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>We seek a means to travel to the void. There, a man named Golbez plots to invade our world. A man who even now holds my sister hostage...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000980_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>私たちは、ヴォイドへ乗り込むため準備をしている。
この世界に侵攻せんとする妖異ゴルベーザを止め、
我が姉を救うために……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000990_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>...To that end, we require a great quantity of aether, which we understand may be had on the Isle of Haam. We came in the hope of exploring how it might best be procured.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_000990_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>新たなゲートを開けるためには、大量のエーテルが要る。
それがハーム島で手に入るかもしれないと聞き、
伝手を求めて、ここへ来たわけだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001000_KRILE<tab>An invasion from the Thirteenth? Must the stakes always be so dramatic...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001000_KRILE<tab>第十三世界からの侵攻……
そんなことになっていたなんて……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001010_ERENVILLE<tab>You have a knack for finding trouble.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001010_ERENVILLE<tab>終末の騒動から、さほど日も経ってないってのに、
よくそんな案件を見つけてくるな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001020_ERENVILLE<tab>If gleaners collected world-ending crises, you could make quite a name for yourself in our profession.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001020_ERENVILLE<tab>おたく、「世界の危機」を収集させたら、
一流のグリーナーになれるんじゃないか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001030_ERENVILLE<tab>It's true the Isle of Haam is a veritable font of aether. But as it's under the Forum's direct jurisdiction, only a privileged few get to set foot there. I myself haven't.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001030_ERENVILLE<tab>それにしても、ハーム島か……。
確かにあそこはエーテルが湧き出すことで有名だな。
哲学者議会の直轄地で、俺は行ったためしがないが。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001040_KRILE<tab>So if we want to help ourselves to the isle's aether, we'll need to secure the Forum's permission.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001040_KRILE<tab>そこでエーテルの採集をしたいということは、
つまり、哲学者議会の許可を取ればいいのよね？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001050_KRILE<tab>Very well. The Students of Baldesion recognize your endeavors as combating a grave threat to the world. As representative, I hereby pledge our full assistance.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001050_KRILE<tab>……わかったわ。
あなたたちの活動は未解明の脅威に挑むものであると判断し、
バルデシオン委員会は賛同、支援します。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001060_KRILE<tab>Now that it's official, you may leave the politics and paperwork to me. Our operations remain small, but we shouldn't meet any undue resistance.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001060_KRILE<tab>哲学者議会には、私から申請書を出してみる。
こちらも少しずつだけど活動を再開しているし、
邪険には扱われないはずよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001070_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>We are truly grateful!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001070_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>ありがとう、頼もしいかぎりだ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001080_URIANGER<tab>If I may.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001080_URIANGER<tab>あなたに、もうひとつ質問をさせてください。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001090_URIANGER<tab>According to the original plan for the exodus, aether collected from the Isle of Haam was to power the ark.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001090_URIANGER<tab>終末の折、この星からの大撤収が実行されていたとして……
ハーム島で採集されたエーテルは、
どのように方舟へ積み込まれる予定だったのでしょうか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001100_URIANGER<tab>Art thou perchance familiar with the logistics of this endeavor?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001100_URIANGER<tab>グリーナーとして、何かご存知ではありませんか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001110_ERENVILLE<tab>I don't know anything about that, I'm afraid, nor do I think any gleaner would. You might have better luck asking someone involved with the ark's construction.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001110_ERENVILLE<tab>悪いが、あの島からエーテルを運んだなんて話は、
同業者からも聞いたことがない。
方舟の製造に携わった連中に聞いてみるべきじゃないか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001120_ERENVILLE<tab>Margrat, for instance. She's a researcher in Sharlayan Hamlet. I met with her for a job recently, and she mentioned working on the <var 1A 02 /var>Ragnarok<var 1A 01 /var>'s propulsion system.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001120_ERENVILLE<tab>最近仕事でやりとりした、
リトルシャーレアンの「マーグラット」って研究者が、
動力まわりの担当だったとか言ってたな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001130_ERENVILLE<tab>You could do worse than to seek her out while awaiting the Forum's verdict.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001130_ERENVILLE<tab>申請の結果を待つ間にでも、よければ訪ねてみるといい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001140_URIANGER<tab>We may well do just that. Our gratitude for thine advice, and may this threat be but a memory upon thy return.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001140_URIANGER<tab>有益な情報に感謝します。
あなたが遠方からご帰還なさるころには、
事態が収束しているように努めましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001150_ERENVILLE<tab>You're quite welcome. Now then, if you'll excuse me.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001150_ERENVILLE<tab>ドウイタシマシテ。
……それじゃ、俺はこのへんで。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001160_KRILE<tab>I'd best start drafting our petition! Go on and find your researcher─I'll contact you as soon as we've made progress.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001160_KRILE<tab>私もさっそく申請書に取り掛かるわ！
事が進んだら連絡するから、
リトルシャーレアンに行ってもらって大丈夫よ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001170_URIANGER<tab>Let us leave matters here to Mistress Krile, and hie ourselves to Labyrinthos.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001170_URIANGER<tab>では、お言葉に甘えると致しましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001180_KRILE<tab>Right, then. Time to put our best foot forward.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001180_KRILE<tab>さて、みんなのためにも気合を入れて……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001190_KRILE<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001190_KRILE<tab>はぁ……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001200_KRILE<tab>A pity you can't tidy yourself. I should've had Y'shtola enchant you when I had the chance.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001200_KRILE<tab>古い資料を整理してる途中だったわ。
まずは片付けからね……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001210_KRILE<tab>And what have we here?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001210_KRILE<tab>あら……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001220_KRILE<tab>Later, Krile. Later. You've work to do!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001220_KRILE<tab>あとあと……！
やるべきことが終わってからだわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001230_HAAMBORTMAN<tab>Bound for the Isle of Haam? You look like the ones Master Fourchenault told me to expect.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001230_HAAMBORTMAN<tab>ハーム島に行きたいんだって？
フルシュノ様から話は聞いてるよ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001240_HAAMBORTMAN<tab>If you're ready to depart, then so am I. Just say the word.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001240_HAAMBORTMAN<tab>全員そろっているならすぐにでも船を出すが、
どうするね？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001250_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Is something the matter?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001250_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>おい、出発しないのか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001260_URIANGER<tab>I did recruit one other to our party, but he is late to arrive...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001260_URIANGER<tab>ええ、あとひとり協力を仰いでいるのですが……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001270_THANCRED<tab>Forgive me my delay.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001270_THANCRED<tab>待たせたな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001280_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Thancred! 'Tis good to see you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001280_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>サンクレッド、君だったか！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001290_THANCRED<tab>If it isn't Varshahn. They do grow up so quickly.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001290_THANCRED<tab>ほう、ずいぶん大きくなったな「ヴァルシャン」。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001300_THANCRED<tab>Urianger tells me we have a host of exciting new tribulations to face.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001300_THANCRED<tab>ウリエンジェから連絡をもらって来てみれば、
どうも新たな問題を前に、苦心してるらしいじゃないか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001310_THANCRED<tab>And you must be Zero. I've heard all about your derring-do in Garlemald. A pleasure.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001310_THANCRED<tab>それで、お前がゼロだな？
ガレマルドでの活躍は聞き及んでる。
よろしくな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001320_URIANGER<tab>Apart from strengthening our company with his redoubtable skill at arms, Thancred may also serve as a mentor in those matters that trouble thee.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001320_URIANGER<tab>彼は戦力としてはもちろんのこと……
悩めるあなたの、良き師となることでしょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001330_URIANGER<tab>I speak of the intangible forces which bring souls together. Thancred is possessed of experience both unique and insightful that I am sure he would gladly share with thee. Thou needst but ask.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001330_URIANGER<tab>他者との「繋がり」について、知りたいのでしょう？
彼ならば、自分なりの答えを示してくれるはず……
頃合いを見計らって、聞いてみてはいかがでしょうか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001340_KOKKOLDANKKOL<tab>Much obliged for clearin' the way! We'll get to work at once!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001340_KOKKOLDANKKOL<tab>よぉ、魔物退治ご苦労さん！
さっそくエーテルの充填作業を進めさせてもらうぜ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001350_KOKKOLDANKKOL<tab>Fillin' these up will take a good while. I'd appreciate it if you stood watch till we've finished.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001350_KOKKOLDANKKOL<tab>満タンまで入れるには、ちーっとばかし時間がかかる。
わりぃが、終わるまで周りを見張っておいてくれるか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001360_KOKKOLDANKKOL<tab>I ain't gettin' chewed to chum by some aether-bloated bugger!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001360_KOKKOLDANKKOL<tab>ほかにも魔物がいたらおっかねぇしよう……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001370_KOKKOLDANKKOL<tab>Oh, by the by.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001370_KOKKOLDANKKOL<tab>あっ、そうだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001380_KOKKOLDANKKOL<tab>Where were you plannin' on puttin' these to use? We could deliver 'em by airship, see─provided it ain't too far.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001380_KOKKOLDANKKOL<tab>充填したタンクは、どこで使う予定だ？
近くだったら、このまま飛空艇で届けてやれるが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001390_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>We would need them transported to Garlemald─to the Tower of Babil.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001390_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>ガレマルドの、バブイルの塔へ運びたいのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001400_KOKKOLDANKKOL<tab>Ahh, that's a long old journey... Too long for a direct flight. Tell you what: we'll send 'em over with the scheduled shipment of provisions headed that way.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001400_KOKKOLDANKKOL<tab>ははーん。
とすると、あちらさんへ救援物資を運ぶ定期便に乗せた方が、
航路に慣れてて安心だな！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001410_KOKKOLDANKKOL<tab>I'll make the arrangements as soon as we get back. Save some poor chocobos havin' to drag this lot through the snow.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001410_KOKKOLDANKKOL<tab>よっしゃ、戻り次第、すぐに手配しといてやるよ！
あんな重てぇモン、チョコボだって乗せたがらねぇからな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001420_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>You have our thanks. We shall not forget your generosity.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001420_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>協力に感謝する。
君たちの厚意を、決して無駄にはしまい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001430_THANCRED<tab>Everything seems to be proceeding apace. I daresay you would've been fine without me.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001430_THANCRED<tab>順調そうだな。
お前たちだけでも大丈夫だったんじゃないか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001440_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Why would you say such a thing?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001440_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>その言葉の根底にあるものは、なんだ……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001450_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>You are not bound by contract or the threat of force, and you gain no advantage by devaluing your own contribution.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001450_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>庇護しているわけではないが、突き放しているわけでもない。
力による脅しや、契約によって作られた関係では、
決してそんな風にはならない……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001460_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Yet you must be bound by something to speak thus. What is it?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001460_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>答えろ、お前たちの間にある「繋がり」は何なんだ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001470_THANCRED<tab>What binds me... Hmm.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001470_THANCRED<tab>俺にとっての、こいつらとの繋がりか。
そうだな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001480_THANCRED<tab>A belief, I suppose. Born of our shared struggles.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001480_THANCRED<tab>たとえ、どこの空の下にいても……
あいつならきっと大丈夫だと、信じられること。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001490_THANCRED<tab>No matter where my comrades go, I have faith they will be fine. For I know that they will walk their chosen path as surely as I walk mine.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001490_THANCRED<tab>妄信や諦めじゃない。
相手の生き方を、想いを、知ってるからこそ、
おのずとそう思えてくるんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001500_THANCRED<tab>I trust them, in short─trite though it may sound.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001500_THANCRED<tab>そんな「信頼」こそが、俺たちを繋いでる。
……言葉にすると、月並みかもしれないがな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001510_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Trust...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001510_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>信頼…………。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001520_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I remember the word. How long has it been since last I used it?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001520_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>思い出した……知っている言葉だ……。
だが……忘れ去るほど久しく、使わなくなっていた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001530_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>It had no place in my dealings. Not with other voidsent, and certainly not with Zenos. Not even in the time before Darkness engulfed the world...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001530_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>妖異同士の取引や、ゼノスとの契約にはなかったもの。
闇の氾濫前の時代ですら、メモリア戦争に身を投じた私たちに、
それは存在しなかった……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001540_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Full often did memoriates betray their own, corrupted by the very power they wielded. You could trust no one but yourself.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001540_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>味方だったはずのメモリア使いが、
闇の力に魅入られ、あっさりと裏切るんだ。
珍しくもない、ありふれた出来事だった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001550_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Alone we fought, and alone we fell.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001550_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>だから誰もがひとりひとりで戦って……
そして、闇に敗れたんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001560_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I wouldn't know how to trust.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001560_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>私は、お前たちのような繋がりを……
信頼を、誰かと結んだことがない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001570_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Is there some trick to it?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001570_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>それは、どうすれば手に入る……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001580_THANCRED<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001580_THANCRED<tab>フッ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001590_THANCRED<tab>Just stay close to this one. You'll learn in no time.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001590_THANCRED<tab>こいつのそばにいれば、いずれわかるだろうさ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001600_THANCRED<tab>Aye, absolutely fine.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001600_THANCRED<tab>ほらな。
お前たちだけでも大丈夫、だろ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001610_URIANGER<tab>I confess, I thought thou mightst have more words of counsel to offer.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001610_URIANGER<tab>おや、もうお話はよろしいので？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001620_THANCRED<tab>Oh, she'll soon get the hang of it─even without my help. After our work here is done, I'll see myself back to the shadows.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001620_THANCRED<tab>あれは俺には青臭すぎる。
島を出次第、裏方に戻らせてもらうぞ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001630_THANCRED<tab>But before that... I take it you've heard as well?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001630_THANCRED<tab>その前に、ひとつ……
ウリエンジェ、お前にも「あの話」がきたか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001640_URIANGER<tab>Indeed. The client seeketh Archons, and 'twould seem our extensive travels and neutrality make us prime candidates.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001640_URIANGER<tab>ええ、依頼人はシャーレアンの賢人をご所望だとか……。
他国を広くまわり、表向きは所属のない我々に、
白羽の矢が立ったようですね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001650_THANCRED<tab>Well, assuming we take on the request, I suspect I'll be stuck with you again. Don't let me down, hm?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001650_THANCRED<tab>引き受けるとなったら、お前と一緒だろうな。
そのときは頼むぞ、大先生。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001660_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Praise the Sisters you are safe!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001660_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>よかった、無事だったのだな！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001670_METTIUS<tab>Don't think I'm indebted to you. I never asked for your help.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001670_METTIUS<tab>こ、こんなことで恩を売ろうとしたって無駄だぞ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001680_JULLUS<tab>You love Garlemald dearly, Lord Mettius. That much is plain. But you're not alone in that.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001680_JULLUS<tab>メッティウス殿……
あなたが祖国を愛していることは、
充分に伝わっています。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001690_JULLUS<tab>We all mourn what has become of our homeland. Bristle at having to rely upon outsiders simply to survive the cold.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001690_JULLUS<tab>ここは俺たちの帝都だというのに、
支援を受けなければ暖を取ることさえままならない。
そんな現状を憂うのは、あなただけではないのです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001700_JULLUS<tab>Even now, I struggle with fear and uncertainty. Day after day, I ask myself, what is right? Where do we go from here?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001700_JULLUS<tab>自分も……ずっと、怖れと不安の中にいます。
何が正しいのか、どの道を選ぶべきなのか……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001710_JULLUS<tab>I've yet to find the answers.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001710_JULLUS<tab>答えはでません。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001720_JULLUS<tab>But I won't stop looking nonetheless. And I won't avert my gaze from our grim reality.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001720_JULLUS<tab>だからこそ、問い続けたいと考えています。
……今このときの現実から、目を背けずに。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001730_METTIUS<tab>Is there hope for us?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001730_METTIUS<tab>そこに希望が見える日が、来るのだろうか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001740_JULLUS<tab>Aye. So long as we live.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001740_JULLUS<tab>生きていれば、きっと。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001750_JULLUS<tab>Garlemald lies in ruins, but the bonds between us will never be broken.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001750_JULLUS<tab>それまでに多くの物事が変わっていったとしても、
我々が生き抜き、繋ぐことで、「鎖」は未来に続いていく。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001760_JULLUS<tab>We are the chain that connects generations past and future. You and I its links. Help us, Lord Mettius, for all we have been and for what we may yet become. Please.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001760_JULLUS<tab>環が結び合い、連なってこその「鎖」です。
どうか、ともにこの国の明日を考えてはいただけないでしょうか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001770_METTIUS<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001770_METTIUS<tab>っ……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001780_METTIUS<tab>To be lectured by the young... It ill becomes a man of my station.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001780_METTIUS<tab>若輩のお前に、国の何たるかを説かれるとは……
政務官失格だな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001790_METTIUS<tab>I will rejoin the talks at Tertium. Might I trouble you to escort me?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001790_METTIUS<tab>……今一度、テルティウム駅での話し合いに戻りたい。
すまないが、護衛を頼めるだろうか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001800_METTIUS<tab>Ere we part... I apologize for my...discourtesy. I owe you my life, and...I thank you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001800_METTIUS<tab>お前たちにも、非礼を詫びよう。
助けてくれたこと……感謝する。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001810_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Jullus, wait. I'd like a word.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001810_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>待て、ユルス。
……聞きたいことがある。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001820_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>With you as well. I'm to stay close, after all.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001820_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>お前もつきあえ。
サンクレッドに、そばにいろと言われたからな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001830_URIANGER<tab>Worry not, we shall see the magistrate safely back to Tertium.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001830_URIANGER<tab>では、メッティウス殿は私たちでお送りしましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001840_JULLUS<tab>What is it?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001840_JULLUS<tab>それで、何を聞きたいんだ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001850_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>You bound that man with trust, didn't you? That's why he did not require coercion to return.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001850_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>お前も「信頼」を結べるんだな。
だからさっきの男は、強制されてもいないのに、
話し合いに応じることにしたんだろう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001860_JULLUS<tab>Er... Shall we walk, perhaps? Chilly standing around here.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001860_JULLUS<tab>ええと、ここに突っ立ってるのもなんだし、
とりあえず…………歩くか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001870_JULLUS<tab>So that's how Zero came to join you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001870_JULLUS<tab>そうか……。
ゼロはそんな経緯で、お前たちと一緒にいるんだな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001880_JULLUS<tab>Still, I'm not sure I'm qualified to explain something like trust.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001880_JULLUS<tab>だが、ゼロの求めてる繋がりってものを、
俺が説明できるかどうか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001890_JULLUS<tab>I wouldn't describe myself as a sociable person. Before all...this...any free time I had, I spent looking after my brother and sister.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001890_JULLUS<tab>自分で言うのもなんだが、
とくべつ交友関係が広い方じゃない。
休みの日も、弟と妹につきあってばかりだった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001900_JULLUS<tab>As for the magistrate, I only told him what's been on my mind of late...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001900_JULLUS<tab>さっきの説得だって、ただ日頃考えていたことを……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001910_JULLUS<tab>But I wouldn't have done so, I think, if it weren't for the twins' influence.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001910_JULLUS<tab>……いや。
伝えてみようと思ったこと自体が、
アルフィノやアリゼーに、感化されてたのかもしれない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001920_JULLUS<tab>Trust is infectious, in a manner of speaking. When someone believes in you, it makes you want to believe in them. In others. In yourself.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001920_JULLUS<tab>信頼は、多分、伝播するんだ。
信じてくれた人がいると、自分も誰かを信じてみようと思う。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001930_JULLUS<tab>Perhaps it's because the magistrate felt that earnestness that he gave us a chance. As I did, after I was caught trying to steal provisions from “the enemy.” Trust comes easy in such company.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001930_JULLUS<tab>そうじゃなかったら、そもそも対話を選ばなかったはずだ。
俺が最初、イルサバード派遣団のキャンプから、
黙って物資を盗もうとしていたようにな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001940_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Little wonder my world is devoid of it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001940_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>……だったら、私の世界に信頼がないのも納得だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001950_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>No one trusts in you, and so you trust in no one. And round the wheel turns.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001950_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>誰からも信じられなかったから、誰も信じなかった。
その積み重ねだったんだろう……どこまでも……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001960_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>During the Contramemoria, we had already come to judge one another based on strength and usefulness.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001960_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>すべての生命が妖異になる前、メモリア戦争の時代から、
私たちは力の強弱や利害関係で互いを判断してきた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001970_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>You either used or were used. Those who rejected this rule didn't survive.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001970_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>他人を利用しろ、利用される側になったらおしまいだ……
そんな風に構えていなければ、生き残れない世界だった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001980_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>My mother wanted to save the world. To fulfill the hopes of memoriates good and true. After she died, I carried on her mission alone.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001980_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>だから私も、母の遺志を……
世界を救うという、善なるメモリア使いたちの意地を、
ただひとりで果たそうとしたんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001990_JULLUS<tab>Alone... Didn't you have anyone to help you?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_001990_JULLUS<tab>ひとりで世界を……。
本当に誰も、お前の仲間にならなかったのか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002000_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Almost. Two men tried, just the once.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002000_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>…………そういえば。
一度だけ、そんなことを真剣に持ち掛けられたな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002010_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>A swordsman and a mage, whom I met when passing through a village. They had saved the people there from corrupted memoriates.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002010_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>ある村に立ち寄ったとき出会った、剣士と魔道士の二人組。
闇のメモリア使いの襲撃から、村人たちを護ったのだという。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002020_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>When they learned our enemies were the same, they seemed heartened.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002020_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>私も闇のメモリア使いと戦っているのだと知ると、
同志だなんだと、喜んでな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002030_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>They claimed to be soldiers of a kingdom called Baron, and were traveling the realm in search of a means to end the Contramemoria.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002030_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>曰く、彼らはバロンという国の兵士で、
メモリア戦争を終結させる手立てを探して、
各地を巡っていたらしい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002040_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>They invited me to join them. I refused. How could I not, having learned the lessons of my world?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002040_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>ともに来ないかと誘われたが、
当時の私にしてみれば、相手が二人組という時点で論外だった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002050_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Those who would work with others always have their own motives. I would not place myself at their mercy. I would not be forced to submit.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002050_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>他人と組んでいる奴には、必ず裏がある。
下手をすれば、数の暴力でこちらを屈服させる気かもしれない。
だからすぐに断ったよ、さがない言葉でな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002060_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I expected some manner of outburst. Some show of frustration at having failed to deceive me. But they simply watched me walk away.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002060_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>彼らは強要するでもなく引き下がった。
計画を仕損じて憤慨するんじゃないかと身構えたが、
ただ寂しげで……変な奴らだと感じたよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002070_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I didn't know what to make of it then, but now... Perhaps they shared a bond of trust. Perhaps they were the last ones left who dared.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002070_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>……今になって思えば、あの二人組だけは、
互いを心から信頼していたのかもしれないな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002080_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Perhaps they hoped I was like them, too. Perhaps it was just an offer and nothing more.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002080_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>信じることを知っていたから、私のことも信じようとした……
なんて、調子のいい空想か。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002090_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I continued fighting alone. But ultimately, I was undone. Overwhelmed by enemies that had banded together.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002090_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>私はその後も、ひとりで戦い続けた。
だがあるとき、徒党を組んだ闇のメモリア使い相手に、
無様に敗れてしまったんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002100_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I was cold. In pain. Wishing desperately that someone would save me.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002100_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>悔しかった。
あのときばかりは、誰かに助けてほしいと願った。
傷は痛く、氷は冷たく、心は弱りきっていた……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002110_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>And as I lay there in solitude, I felt it happen. The breaking of our world.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002110_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>その瞬間だったよ、世界が壊れたのは。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002120_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Darkness washed over me, and I was swept into the rift.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002120_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>お前たちの言う闇の氾濫が起こり、
私はひとり、次元の狭間に閉じ込められた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002130_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>When I finally managed to return, it was to a world forever transformed. My home, now filled with abominations.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002130_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>亀裂を見つけ、再び故郷に戻ったときには、
妖異のみが生きる世界になりはてていたんだ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002140_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I had a chance to learn about trust...and forsook it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002140_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>そうして私は、誰かを信じる機会を失った……というわけだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002150_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I never had the power to save my home single-handed. I should have accepted their invitation.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002150_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>元より世界を救うだけの実力もなかったのだし、
ためらわず、あの二人組の手を取ってみればよかったのかもな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002160_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Had I joined them, as I've joined you, I might not have had to face the end of the world alone.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002160_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>もしもそれで、お前たちのように信頼を結べていたら……
あんな無様な姿で世界の終わりを迎えはしなかっただろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002170_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>But it's all history, now. No amount of reflection or regret will change our present reality.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002170_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>まあ、すべては終わったことだ。
どんな仮定をしたところで、現実は変わらない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002180_JULLUS<tab>Whatever may have happened in the past, you're still here, Zero. Alive.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002180_JULLUS<tab>過去がどうだったとしても、ゼロは今、生きてるだろ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002190_JULLUS<tab>So long as you're alive, there will always be hope. No matter how bad things get.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002190_JULLUS<tab>俺たち帝国民が、まさしく過渡期にあるように……
生きていれば、望んでいなくたって変化がもたらされる。
お前にだって必ずな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002200_JULLUS<tab>What you couldn't do yesterday, you might still do today.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002200_JULLUS<tab>できなかったことが、今もできないとは限らないんじゃないか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002210_JULLUS<tab>Think about it. It's plain that you've forged bonds with those around you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002210_JULLUS<tab>実際、この世界でお前と行動をともにしてる奴は、
お前のことを信頼しているように見える。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002220_JULLUS<tab>If you didn't feel that in some sense, would you have risked your life as you did for a meager ration of buuz?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002220_JULLUS<tab>そうじゃなかったら……
あいつらと出会う前のお前だったら、
パンひとつの借りで妖異と戦ってくれたか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002230_JULLUS<tab>I trust you too, for what it's worth.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002230_JULLUS<tab>俺だって、お前を信頼の置ける奴だと思ってるよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002240_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Here it is again.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002240_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>…………まただ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002250_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>The fire that burned in my breast when you came to my rescue. The urge to weep, though there is no sorrow...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002250_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>お前たちが、力尽きそうな私を助けにきてくれたときと同じ。
嬉しいのに泣きたいような……
言葉にならない熱が、胸の内を巡っている。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002260_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>If this is trust, then what must I do? How do I answer it?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002260_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>これが信頼なら、私はどう応えればいい……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>However you like.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>思うようにすればいい

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>With a handshake, perhaps?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>まずは友好の握手から！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002270_JULLUS<tab>Give me your hand.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002270_JULLUS<tab>じゃあ、ほら。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002280_JULLUS<tab>It's not something you do constantly, mind. A friend is a friend regardless.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002280_JULLUS<tab>別に、いちいちこうしなくたって、
仲間にだって友にだってなれるけどな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002290_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>A “friend”? ...So that's what it means.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002290_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>友……ああ、そうか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002300_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Someone you trust.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002300_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>おのずと信じることができる、
そんな相手を、友と呼ぶのか……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002310_URIANGER<tab>Let us take a moment to review matters as they stand.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002310_URIANGER<tab>では、私たちは改めて……
ヴォイドへと向かう計画について、現状を整理いたしましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002320_URIANGER<tab>Having procured sufficient stores of aether, we may now channel the requisite energy unto the moon via the Tower of Babil. Our work on the star is complete.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002320_URIANGER<tab>エーテルタンクを手配し、
バブイルの塔の使用許可を得たことで、
月にエーテルを送り込む準備が整いました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002330_URIANGER<tab>However, we have yet to receive word from Y'shtola as to the state of the lunar preparations.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002330_URIANGER<tab>これを以って、私たちの受け持った地上の準備は完了……。
しかし、月の準備を担当するヤ・シュトラからは、
いまだ連絡が来ておりません。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002340_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>A ritual to open the gate, and measures to forestall a voidsent invasion...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002340_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>彼女は、ゲートを開く術の仕込みと、
開いたあとに向けた妖異対策を進めると言っていたな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002350_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Neither task is simple nor quickly completed. She would doubtless benefit from our assistance.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002350_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>いずれも複雑な対応が必要であることは、想像に難くない。
時間が掛かっているのも、頷ける話だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002360_URIANGER<tab>The very thing I was about to propose. Let us join her above and lend what aid we may.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002360_URIANGER<tab>ええ、ですから我々も月へと向かい、
彼女たちの手伝いに回れればと思うのです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002370_URIANGER<tab>Ere we set forth, however, Y'shtola did bid me relay a message to thee.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002370_URIANGER<tab>ただし……あなたには別件が。
地上の準備が終わり次第お伝えするようにと、
ヤ・シュトラから頼まれていた内容です。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002380_URIANGER<tab>As thou art well aware, a key objective of our mission is the extraction of thy sister Azdaja from the void.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002380_URIANGER<tab>曰く、此度の作戦においては、
アジュダヤをヴォイドの月から連れ帰ることも見据えて、
巨大なゲートを開く……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002390_URIANGER<tab>Held captive for millennia and divested of an eye, she is like to be severely weakened. To make good her escape, she shall require aid─aid that is best provided by a fellow great wyrm.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002390_URIANGER<tab>眼を抜かれ、疲弊しているであろう彼女を、
同じ七大天竜に支えてもらえると心強い、とのことです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002400_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>You would have me go in my true form?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002400_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>「ヴリトラ」が出てこい、というわけか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002410_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Very well. Like our sire, we great wyrms are capable of traversing the great expanse. The journey will take some time, but I shall take myself to the moon.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002410_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>承知した。
私とて、星渡る龍ミドガルズオルムの仔が一翼。
少し時間はかかるだろうが、竜の身で月へと向かおう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002420_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>To begin with, I shall return this vessel to Radz-at-Han, that I may have both my eyes.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002420_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>万全を期すためにも、この身体は帰還させ、
制御に用いていた私の眼を回収しよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002430_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>And until such time as we find Azdaja, I would entrust her eye to your keeping.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002430_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>アジュダヤと再会するまで、
カイナッツォから取り戻した彼女の眼は、
君に持っていてもらいたい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002440_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Will you do this for me?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002440_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>……頼めるだろうか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002450_URIANGER<tab>We shall contact you via linkpearl once all is in place on the moon. You need but follow Y'shtola's instructions.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002450_URIANGER<tab>月での準備が整い次第、リンクパールでお伝えします。
バブイルの塔からのエーテル射出は、
ヤ・シュトラの号令に従っていただければと。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002460_ALISAIE<tab>Understood. We'll be ready.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002460_ALISAIE<tab>わかったわ。
いつでもいけるように待機しておくから。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002470_JULLUS<tab>Take care, Zero.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002470_JULLUS<tab>ゼロも、頑張れよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002480_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>It will be the briefest of homecomings. I'll be back before you know it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002480_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>なに……少し故郷に戻るだけだ、難しい話じゃないさ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002490_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>In Mare Lamentorum, then. Go well!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002490_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>ではまた、嘆きの海で……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002500_URIANGER<tab>I took the liberty of informing Y'shtola of our arrival. She and her entourage should be here momentarily.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002500_URIANGER<tab>ヤ・シュトラには、すでに連絡を入れました。
すぐにこちらへ来てくださるそうです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002510_YSHTOLA<tab>Forgive me, I'd hoped to have everything in order sooner. My thanks for the extra hands.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002510_YSHTOLA<tab>悪いわね、手伝いに来させてしまって……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002515_URIANGER<tab>[AMUSED CHUCKLE]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002515_URIANGER<tab>フッ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002520_URIANGER<tab>Alphinaud and Alisaie stand ready at the Tower of Babil. Vrtra is also en route.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002520_URIANGER<tab>地上の準備は、ひととおり完了しております。
バブイルの塔へは、アルフィノ様とアリゼー様が……
かの天竜への伝言も済みました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002530_YSHTOLA<tab>Excellent. You've done well, all of you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002530_YSHTOLA<tab>みんなありがとう。
短い間に、素晴らしい成果ね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002540_YSHTOLA<tab>For my part, I've managed to prepare the ritual with help from the watcher.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002540_YSHTOLA<tab>こちらは、月の監視者の協力も得て、
どうにかゲートを開くための術式を展開し終えたわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002550_YSHTOLA<tab>All that remains is to channel the aether from below. This should─I pray─open a gate leading to the moon of the Thirteenth.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002550_YSHTOLA<tab>あとは地上からエーテルが流し込まれれば……
理論上は、第十三世界の月と繋がるはずよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002560_NIDHANA<tab>May I just say how excited we are to be a part of this grand undertaking! The development of the artificial Atomos was one thing, but this is an opportunity like no other!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002560_NIDHANA<tab>こんな偉業に携われて、私たちも大興奮！
人造アトモスについて研究したときに、
ヴォイド関連の資料を片っ端から浚った甲斐があったよ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002570_NIDHANA<tab>Y'shtola even managed to get a loan of Allagan treatises on voidsent summoning from the prized collection of the Sons of Saint Coinach!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002570_NIDHANA<tab>それになんと、ヤ・シュトラさんが、
アラグ帝国の妖異召喚にまつわる文献も見せてくれたの。
かの聖コイナク財団の秘蔵資料だよ！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002580_NIDHANA<tab>The empire's application of aetherochemistry in regulating voidgates provided us with many a useful insight for our work, let me tell you!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002580_NIDHANA<tab>魔科学が、いかにしてヴォイドゲートを制御し、
妖異の軍勢を率いるに至ったのか……
作業をするにあたって、すごく参考になったよ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002590_YSHTOLA<tab>I asked a favor of G'raha Tia when we were comparing notes on cross-rift travel.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002590_YSHTOLA<tab>異世界への召喚について話を聞きがてら、
グ・ラハ・ティアに頼んだのよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002600_YSHTOLA<tab>Given his credentials, I was confident he wouldn't be denied.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002600_YSHTOLA<tab>高名なアラグの専門家なら、
当然、借りてこられるでしょう……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002610_YSHTOLA<tab>The knowledge of our forebears has brought us far. As has our own.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002610_YSHTOLA<tab>私は信じるわ。
時代も地域も超えて、人が積み重ねてきたものを。
そして、私自身のことを。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002620_YSHTOLA<tab>And with our knowledge and resources, we shall construct a voidsent containment seal on a heretofore unseen scale.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002620_YSHTOLA<tab>だから残る準備は、ゲートが開いたあとの対策として、
「対妖異防衛網」を作り上げることだけ。
……手伝ってもらえて？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002630_URIANGER<tab>Containment seal... Then thou wouldst make use of...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002630_URIANGER<tab>対妖異防衛網……やはり、あの方法で……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002640_YSHTOLA<tab>Aye. A tried and tested means of holding dark entities at bay is readily available here. 'Twould be remiss of us not to employ it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002640_YSHTOLA<tab>ええ、この場所にはすでに、
闇の存在を留める手立てが備わっているのだもの。
使わない手はないわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002650_YSHTOLA<tab>We shall reforge the brands that Zenos and Fandaniel destroyed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002650_YSHTOLA<tab>私たちは、ゼノスに破壊された「剣」を修復する……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002660_YSHTOLA<tab>That which held even Zodiark shall more than suffice for voidsent of any persuasion.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002660_YSHTOLA<tab>ゾディアークの封印機構を再起動させ、
侵入してくる妖異を押し留めるのよ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002670_NIDHANA<tab>The watcher is already hard at work tending to the most critical parts of the brands' restoration.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002670_NIDHANA<tab>修復の主立ったところは、
月の監視者さんが引き受けてくれてるんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002680_NIDHANA<tab>There are, however, a number of concerning factors that remain. With your help, I'm sure we can resolve them!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002680_NIDHANA<tab>ただ、いくつか不安要素が残っててね……。
みんなで協力して、それを潰そうって話してたところ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002690_YSHTOLA<tab>Time is of the essence, so I suggest we continue this discussion as we make our way to the brands.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002690_YSHTOLA<tab>時間も惜しいことだし、
「剣」のもとへ移動しながら話しましょうか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002700_LIVINGWAY<tab>Dreadfully sorry to have kept you all waiting!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002700_LIVINGWAY<tab>お待たせしましたわ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002710_MAPPINGWAY<tab>Hello there, friends. And new person. Heard there was a bit of a rush, so we gathered what combat-ready supporters we had available.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002710_MAPPINGWAY<tab>やあ、久しぶりぃ。
大急ぎで警備用サポーターを集めてほしいって言われたから、
出せるだけ引っ張り出してきたよぉ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002720_URIANGER<tab>A welcome contribution. Thine initiative never ceaseth to amaze.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002720_URIANGER<tab>素晴らしい。
あなた方の行動力には、いつも助けられていますね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002730_LIVINGWAY<tab>Oh, stop! You're making me blush!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002730_LIVINGWAY<tab>そんな……フフ……それほどでもありませんわ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002740_LIVINGWAY<tab>Even now as we pursue new dreams, aiding the people of Etheirys remains our greatest joy.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002740_LIVINGWAY<tab>わたくしたちは、新たな「夢」を探しはじめています。
とはいえ、ヒトのお役に立つということは、
やはり本質というか本懐というか抗いがたいウルトラハピネス。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002750_LIVINGWAY<tab>Though we have fulfilled the purpose given to us by Hydaelyn, aiding the people of Etheirys remains our greatest joy.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002750_LIVINGWAY<tab>ハイデリン様から授けられた役目はもう終わっている。
とはいえ、ヒトのお役に立つということは、
やはり本質というか本懐というか抗いがたいウルトラハピネス。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002760_LIVINGWAY<tab>So you can count on us, ever and always!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002760_LIVINGWAY<tab>これからも！　遠慮なく！　ずいずいと！
わたくしたちにお任せくださいませ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002770_LIVINGWAY<tab>Right, so! We originally deployed these supporters to patrol the moon and keep it safe.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002770_LIVINGWAY<tab>さてさて、こちらのサポーターたちは本来、
月を警備するために配備されるものです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002780_LIVINGWAY<tab>They've never tussled with voidsent before, but with sufficient data, they ought to hold their own against the ghastly fiends.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002780_LIVINGWAY<tab>妖異と戦ったことはありませんが……
そこはそれ、適した戦い方をインプットすることで、
一騎当千の働きをするようになりますわ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002790_LIVINGWAY<tab>Practical, tactical data, acquired in the moment. And who better to give the supporters an educational thrashing than the champion of Etheirys?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002790_LIVINGWAY<tab>というわけで！
妖異をよく知る皆様に、サポーターとの模擬戦をお願いしても？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002800_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I believe I would make a better instructor.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002800_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>なら、私が適任だろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002810_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Not only have I fought voidsent─I am one.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002810_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>よく知るどころか、半ば妖異のようなものだからな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002820_SLEEPINGWAY<tab>Well don't just stand there, engage!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002820_SLEEPINGWAY<tab>何だか知らねぇが発進だぁッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002830_SLEEPINGWAY<tab>Engage, engage, engage!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002830_SLEEPINGWAY<tab>そぉれ発進発進発進発進ンンン！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002840_LIVINGWAY<tab>That'll do! That'll do!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002840_LIVINGWAY<tab>も、もう充分ですわ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002850_LIVINGWAY<tab>A defeat bitterer than the bitterest carrot... Using this experience, we must enhance the supporters and turn them into voidsent slaughter-bots!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002850_LIVINGWAY<tab>ううぅ、圧倒的な敗北……！
この経験を活かして改造、妖異抹殺マシンを、
ただちに作り上げなくては……ッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002860_MAPPINGWAY<tab>Indeed... Right after we've managed to put the poor dears back together.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002860_MAPPINGWAY<tab>んー……。
これ、改造の前に一旦修理しなきゃダメだねぇ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002870_URIANGER<tab>Pray forgive our comrade's enthusiasm. May I inquire as to how long the repairs will take?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002870_URIANGER<tab>申し訳ありません。
修理には時間がかかりそうでしょうか……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002880_MAPPINGWAY<tab>On an ordinary day, I'd say no less than five carrots, briskly consumed.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002880_MAPPINGWAY<tab>普段のペースで考えたら、
5ニンジン分、小気味よくって感じかなぁ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002890_MAPPINGWAY<tab>But if you were to provide us with encouragement...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002890_MAPPINGWAY<tab>ただ、もし、もしもだよ？
キミたちが、ボクらを励ましてくれたなら……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002900_MAPPINGWAY<tab>We just might be able to do it in two.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002900_MAPPINGWAY<tab>2ニンジン分まで、短縮、できちゃうかも……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002910_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>This, I leave to you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002910_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>今度はお前が適任だな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002920_YSHTOLA<tab>Can you hear me? We've just finished restoring the brands.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002920_YSHTOLA<tab>(-ヤ・シュトラ-)……聞こえるかしら？
おかげさまで「剣」の修復はどうにか完了よ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002930_YSHTOLA<tab>Let us reconvene once you've finished tending to matters there. The culmination of our efforts is nigh!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002930_YSHTOLA<tab>(-ヤ・シュトラ-)そちらの作業が終わり次第、合流して頂戴。
いよいよヴォイドゲートを開けるわよ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002950_YSHTOLA<tab>(-Y'shtola-)Apologies for the wait. The preparations here are finally complete.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002950_YSHTOLA<tab>(-ヤ・シュトラ-)待たせたわね。
月側の準備も、すべて整ったわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002960_ALPHINAUD<tab>Excellent. The tower too is activated. But give the word, and we will begin channeling the aether.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002960_ALPHINAUD<tab>よかった。
バブイルの塔も、すでに再起動が完了している。
今すぐそちらにエーテルを送っても？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002970_YSHTOLA<tab>(-Y'shtola-)Very well, then. Make it so.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002970_YSHTOLA<tab>(-ヤ・シュトラ-)ええ、お願い。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002980_ALISAIE<tab>The moment of truth!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002980_ALISAIE<tab>いくわよ、アルフィノ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002990_NIDHANA<tab>By the Sisters...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_002990_NIDHANA<tab>エーテル……すごい量……っ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003000_YSHTOLA<tab>Urianger, commence your invocations. 'Tis time to open our gate!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003000_YSHTOLA<tab>ウリエンジェ、そちらも術式の展開を開始して頂戴。
ヴォイドゲートをこじ開けるわよ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003010_YSHTOLA<tab>A tear is beginning to form! Quickly, activate the brands!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003010_YSHTOLA<tab>次元に裂け目ができはじめたわ……！
あなたは「剣」の起動を！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003020_YSHTOLA<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003020_YSHTOLA<tab>ハァ……ハァ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003030_YSHTOLA<tab>Success... The gate is open, and the seal appears to be in place...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003030_YSHTOLA<tab>ゲートは開いた……
封印機構も作動しているように見える……あとは……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003040_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Let's see how well it holds.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003040_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>それが効果を発揮するか、だな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003050_VOIDSENT04735<tab>What an enormous gate! Lord Golbez will be eager to hear of this!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003050_VOIDSENT04735<tab>ゴルベーザ様に命じラレテ、来てミレバ……
ナント大きな門ダロウ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003060_VOIDSENT04735<tab>So this is the promised land... The land of boundless aether!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003060_VOIDSENT04735<tab>ここが約束の地……
エーテル豊かナ「彼の地」ということカ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003070_VOIDSENT04735<tab>Arrrgh!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003070_VOIDSENT04735<tab>ウギャアッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003080_URIANGER<tab>I daresay the seal doth serve its purpose.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003080_URIANGER<tab>図らずも実証できたようですね。
封印機構は、想定どおりに機能していると……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003090_VRITRA<tab>I see all proceedeth apace. Remarkable...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003090_VRITRA<tab>遅くなった。
事は順調に進んでいるようだな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003100_YSHTOLA<tab>Indeed. Just this moment, a voidsent emerged from the gate─by which we may safely assume it leads to the Thirteenth.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003100_YSHTOLA<tab>ええ、私たちの開いたゲートから妖異がやってきた。
第十三世界に繋がっている証拠だわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003110_NIDHANA<tab>It's incredible, Y'shtola! Truly incredible! Oh, what an honor it is to have been part of this historic achievement!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003110_NIDHANA<tab>すごいよ、ヤ・シュトラさん！
この場に立ち会えて、アタシたちも嬉しい！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003120_YSHTOLA<tab>A part is an understatement. None of this would have been possible without you and yours.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003120_YSHTOLA<tab>ありがとう。
みんなの協力のおかげよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003130_YSHTOLA<tab>Our success has also served to solidify our understanding of cross-rift travel.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003130_YSHTOLA<tab>この成功は、次元跳躍の基礎理論が確立できたことも意味するわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003140_YSHTOLA<tab>The Ascians rejoined reflections to the Source by instigating elemental imbalances. These imbalances weakened the barrier between realities, causing the aether of a reflection to flood the Source.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003140_YSHTOLA<tab>アシエンは世界を統合するために、
鏡像世界を特定の属性の力に偏らせることで、次元の壁を破壊し、
そのエーテルを原初世界に流し込もうとしてきた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003150_YSHTOLA<tab>But why is it that reflections are predisposed to rejoin the Source? Why have they never merged with one another?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003150_YSHTOLA<tab>では、なぜ鏡像世界は、別の鏡像世界とではなく、
原初世界に統合されてしまうのかしら？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003160_URIANGER<tab>Thou art suggesting there is a unique property inherent to the Source─one responsible for such an outcome?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003160_URIANGER<tab>原初世界だけに、なにか特別な力が働いていると……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003170_YSHTOLA<tab>I am. 'Tis my conclusion that, as the point of origin for the reflections, the Source has an innate “pull” over them.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003170_YSHTOLA<tab>ええ、本来ひとつだった世界は、
原初世界を起点に、元に戻ろうと引きあうのでは、と考えたの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003180_YSHTOLA<tab>Hydaelyn, I believe, sought to suppress that pull, which is why She was created with the power of Light─of stasis.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003180_YSHTOLA<tab>そしてハイデリンはおそらく、
統合引力ともいうべき、世界が引き合う力を抑え込んでいた。
だからこそ、「停滞」の力を司る存在として創られたのよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003190_YSHTOLA<tab>Meanwhile, the power of Darkness─of activity─reigns in the void. Hydaelyn's influence would naturally be weaker, and this manifested in the form of planar fissures.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003190_YSHTOLA<tab>一方でヴォイドは闇、つまり「活性」の力に偏っている。
だからこそ、ハイデリンによる抑制効果が崩れやすく、
クラックが自然発生するほどに繋がりやすいんじゃないかしら。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003200_YSHTOLA<tab>Working with this hypothesis, I set my sights upon where the pull was assessed to be strongest. And through our combined efforts, we succeeded in opening a gate to the void.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003200_YSHTOLA<tab>今回は、こうした仮定の下で、
もっとも強い引力の先を狙って、次元の壁に穴を開けた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003210_YSHTOLA<tab>Now, I must stress: it was because we sought the void that we succeeded. Pleased though I am to have my theory proven, the secrets of travel to other reflections still elude us.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003210_YSHTOLA<tab>言い換えれば、行き先がヴォイドだからこそ成功しただけ。
基礎理論が固まったとはいえ、
これだけでは、ほかの鏡像世界は狙えないわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003220_YSHTOLA<tab>Even so, in the reality that lies beyond the Eighth Umbral Calamity, there are those who found a way to reach the First. I will not rest until I do the same.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003220_YSHTOLA<tab>それでも、第八霊災後の未来では、
第一世界への次元跳躍をやってのけた人たちがいたのだから……
理論を突き詰めていけば、いずれ必ず……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003230_ESTINIEN<tab>One step closer to fulfilling your dream, eh?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003230_ESTINIEN<tab>魔女殿の夢は、大きく前進したというわけだな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003240_YSHTOLA<tab>Just a step. Many more remain to be taken.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003240_YSHTOLA<tab>まだまだこれからよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003250_YSHTOLA<tab>Which further motivates me to forestall a voidsent invasion. So come, let us set forth─to find Azdaja, and put an end to Golbez's plot!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003250_YSHTOLA<tab>だからこそ、ヴォイドからの侵攻で研究の邪魔はさせないわ。
さあ、アジュダヤを探して、ゴルベーザの計画を阻止するわよ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003260_VRITRA<tab>Climb upon my back. I shall take us to the gate.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003260_VRITRA<tab>皆、私の背に乗るんだ。
ヴォイドゲートの位置まで、大穴を降りよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003270_URIANGER<tab>As we did discuss prior, I shall see the alchemists safely home, then together with the Loporrits, maintain vigil over the gate.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003270_URIANGER<tab>では、私は錬金術師の皆さんを地上に送り届け、
レポリットたちと連携して、ゲートを監視しておきましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003280_NIDHANA<tab>May the Sisters watch over and keep you safe!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003280_NIDHANA<tab>みんな、気をつけて！
必ず無事に帰ってきてね……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003290_VRITRA<tab>Unto the void once more!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003290_VRITRA<tab>さあ、今再びヴォイドへ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003300_YSHTOLA<tab>This is the moon of the Thirteenth?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003300_YSHTOLA<tab>ここが……第十三世界の月……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003310_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>It is. Ever since the Flood, it has been a sanguinary orb in the sky.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003310_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>ああ、間違いない。
闇の氾濫からこちら、天に昇るのはいつも血のように赤い月だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003320_ESTINIEN<tab>No voidsent. A rather more subdued reception than I had anticipated.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003320_ESTINIEN<tab>妖異の大群とご対面かと思っていたが、ずいぶんと静かだな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003330_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>But unsurprising, given how jealously Golbez conceals the location of his domain.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003330_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>ゴルベーザは、自身の領域がどこにあるのか、
限られた配下にしか伝えていないということだった。
なら、これほど閑散としているのも頷ける。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003340_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Still, we must remain on guard. One of his minions came through the gate, after all, and more may lie in wait.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003340_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>だが、気は抜かない方がいい……。
ここから原初世界に侵入した妖異がいた以上、
奴の駒が潜んでいないともかぎらないからな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003350_VRITRA<tab>I do not sense my sister... Where could she be? Where?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003350_VRITRA<tab>姉さん、近くにいないのか……！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003360_ESTINIEN<tab>Steady, Vrtra. We've barely arrived. Let us explore our surrounds before drawing conclusions.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003360_ESTINIEN<tab>そう焦るな、ヴリトラ。
ひとまず周りの状況を確認してみるべきじゃないか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003370_VRITRA<tab>Yes... Thou art right.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003370_VRITRA<tab>すまない、気が急いた……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003380_VRITRA<tab>I shall survey the moon from above. The ground, I leave to you all.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003380_VRITRA<tab>では、私は上空をひとまわりしてこよう。
君たちは地上を頼む。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003390_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>The chasm has caught your attention as well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003390_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>お前も、この大穴が気になるか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003400_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>There's some manner of structure below. Worth a look, wouldn't you say?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003400_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>何か、構造物があるな。
降りて確認してみるべきか……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003410_YSHTOLA<tab>I too sense something here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003410_YSHTOLA<tab>やはりここが一際怪しいわね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003420_YSHTOLA<tab>This pit much resembles the Cradle of Darkness on our moon, where Zodiark was once imprisoned.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003420_YSHTOLA<tab>これとよく似た大穴が、原初世界の嘆きの海にもあった。
ゾディアークが封印されていた「闇の揺り籠」よ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003430_YSHTOLA<tab>If this place serves the same function, then a fragment of His power must have been sealed in the depths.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003430_YSHTOLA<tab>だとすると、この奥底には、
分割されたゾディアークの力が封じられていたのでしょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003440_YSHTOLA<tab>Strange, though. When Zodiark perished in the Source, I presumed that every aspect of Him was thus unmade, and His power scattered.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003440_YSHTOLA<tab>原初世界にいた本体が消滅した以上、
それらの力も消え去ったものと思っていたけれど……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003450_YSHTOLA<tab>But it's unmistakable, the Darkness that permeates this abyss. Could a trace of Him yet remain...or is it something else?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003450_YSHTOLA<tab>この大穴には、ひときわ濃い闇が満ちているわ。
ゾディアークの残滓なのかしら……それとも……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003460_VRITRA<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003460_VRITRA<tab>ハッ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003470_VRITRA<tab>I hear thee, Sister! I hear thee!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003470_VRITRA<tab>聞こえた……姉さん……ッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003480_VRITRA<tab>Climb on, my friends! Azdaja is here, within this chasm!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003480_VRITRA<tab>皆、もう一度乗れ！
この大穴の中に……姉さんがいる！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003490_VRITRA<tab>Sister!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003490_VRITRA<tab>姉さん！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003500_VRITRA<tab>'Tis I, Vrtra! I have come to rescue thee!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003500_VRITRA<tab>わかるだろう、私だ！
姉さんを助けにきた……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003510_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>You were entrusted with Azdaja's eye, were you not?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003510_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>お前、確か竜の眼を預かっていただろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003520_AZDAJA<tab>What? How...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003520_AZDAJA<tab>ああ……私は…………

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003530_AZDAJA<tab>Vrtra...? Wherefore art thou here...?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003530_AZDAJA<tab>ヴリトラ……？
あなたが、なぜここに……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003540_VRITRA<tab>Oh, thank goodness!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003540_VRITRA<tab>ああ、よかった……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003550_VRITRA<tab>'Tis thee, dear sister. Truly thee... How long have I dreamed of this moment!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003550_VRITRA<tab>本当にアジュダヤ姉さんだ……！
ずっと、ずっと、会いたかった……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003560_VRITRA<tab>Would that I could have found thee sooner...but I am here now. Let us return home, together.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003560_VRITRA<tab>ずいぶんと遅くなってしまったが、姉さんを助けにきた。
さあ帰ろう、私たちの世界へ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003570_AZDAJA<tab>The thought filleth me with joy...but I fear it cannot be. Not even with a dragon's might can these chains be broken.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003570_AZDAJA<tab>嬉しいけれど……それは、叶わないわ。
竜の力をもってしても、この呪縛は破れない……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003580_AZDAJA<tab>For they are forged of the very will of the man named Golbez.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003580_AZDAJA<tab>これは、ゴルベーザと名乗った男の、
執念そのものなのだから……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003590_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>So this is indeed Golbez's domain.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003590_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>やはり、ここがゴルベーザの領域なのか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003600_AZDAJA<tab>Thou keepest company with mortals?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003600_AZDAJA<tab>あなた、ヒトと行動しているの……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003610_VRITRA<tab>I do. They are my stalwart allies, without whom I could not have come this far.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003610_VRITRA<tab>ああ……。
ここまでくるのを助けてくれた、大事な仲間だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003620_AZDAJA<tab>Is that so... Then much time hath passed indeed.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003620_AZDAJA<tab>そう……。
それだけ長い年月が過ぎたのね……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003630_AZDAJA<tab>It doth feel like only yesterday that we were fighting the voidsent hordes the men of Allag had unleashed on Meracydia...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003630_AZDAJA<tab>……あのとき、私たちはアラグ帝国と戦っていた。
彼らが呼び寄せた妖異の軍勢が、メラシディアを蹂躙したの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003640_AZDAJA<tab>Desperate to save Tiamat, I flew into this lightless world to strike at the heart of the Cloud of Darkness's forces.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003640_AZDAJA<tab>私はティアマットを助けたくて、この世界に飛び込んだ。
「暗闇の雲」の軍勢を、ひとりでも多く倒せればいいと……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003650_AZDAJA<tab>But the voidsent I slew returned again and again. And before I knew it, the rift betwixt worlds had closed. I was stranded. Bereft of strength...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003650_AZDAJA<tab>けれどこちらでは、妖異は何度でも蘇ってくる。
世界を繋ぐ門が閉ざされ、帰るすべも失って、
次第に疲弊した私は…………。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003660_VRITRA<tab>Thou didst save the lives of full many, Sister.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003660_VRITRA<tab>姉さんが妖異の軍勢を留めておいてくれたおかげで、
原初世界では、多くの同胞の命が救われた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06400_003670_VRITRA<tab>Today, we abide in harmony with men, working side by side and forging enduring bonds.
target:
